name: Doodle Rider Bus
description:
It is time to test your driving skills in this crazy simulation game.In Coach Driving you are a bus driver or coach driver whose job it is to drive the big 3D city and jungle environment. The happier the passengers with your coach.This simulator is very interesting and challenging game like you’ve never seen before.Make sure that your passengers feel safe in your coach extreme bus while you drive your passengers to their destination. If you like precision driving games like hill climb adventure simulator you will also like this city coach driving simulator with real city coach driving features.
This game contain multiple bus selection and multiple environment.Your duty to pick and drop passenger from different destinations.So ride carefully,a some mistake make you harmful.So why are you waiting lets come and start this game.
